backbone_distance_tolerance.description: Allowed backbone distance tolerance in Angstrom.

side_chain_distance_tolerance.description: Allowed side-chain distance tolerance in Angstrom.

angle_tolerance.description: Allowed angle tolerance in multiples of 20 degrees.

rmsd_cutoff.description: Threshold above which hits will be filtered by RMSD.

items.description: Allowed exchanges at this position as three-letter-codes.

limit.description: Optionally: Stop after accepting this many hits.

atom_pairing_scheme.description: Which atoms to consider to compute RMSD scores and transformations.

motif_pruning_strategy.description: Specifies how query motifs are pruned (i.e. simplified). The default option 'KRUSKAL' determines the minimum spanning tree of residue pairs in the query. This leads to less stringent queries and faster results.

whitelist.description: When set: Consider only structures in the specified set.

items.description: Entry identifier that is enabled in the search space.

blacklist.description: Specified entry identifiers will not be evaluated.

items.description: Entry identifier that will be explicitly ignored.
